name: Dino City Hunter 3D Simulator
description:
Dino City Hunter 3D Simulator

Play the real dinosaur game and have lot of fun in destroying city!! Smash the city and be the massive dinosaur and roam around the extreme locations.

Explore with your dinosaur an entire world. A really amazing dinosaur simulator game: get around with your dinosaur, eat everything you find on your way! Experience Amazing 3D graphics and prehistoric Jurassic park environments.

This amazing and realistic 3D game is the best dinosaur simulation game, eat each and everything that comes in your way.

While playing this amazing Dino Hunting simulator game, you will be put through various deadly challenges and objectives.
Complete the tasks and destroy the city in this action packed Dinosaur simulator game.

key features:

=> 3D Graphics and Realistic Environments
=> Realistic HD Graphics
=> Realistic game play and cool sound
=> Challenging objectives
